meta.description: Language labels for the lowevel module of "cachecleaner"

languageKey.label: Cache Cleaner -- To clean up old or expired records from cache tables

Several cache tables have an expiry field, but are never cleaned up automatically. This script provides such a service. It can also clean up other tables that have no expiry field, basing itself on any date field and given a lifetime for expiry.
Run OPTIMIZE on the tables after all appropriate records have been deleted.
Enter a comma-separated list of table names. Only these tables will be cleaned up, instead of the whole configured list. Ignore to clean up all tables.
Affected tables
Here is a list of all tables that could be cleaned up, along with the number of records that could be deleted given your current settings.
Table %1$s: %2$d records to delete
Table %s: no records to delete
%d records deleted.
No records deleted.
Cleaning records for table "%s"
Table was also optimized.
Invalid configuration found.
Table %s: Invalid configuration found.
Cleanup skipped!
No tables to clean. Please set up a configuration first.
